TFButtons

class ui.tf_widgets.tf_buttons.TFPushButton(text, parent=None, callback=None, object_name=None)[source]

Bases: QPushButton

A custom push button with standardized styling for the TF application.

This base button class provides consistent font, height, and styling across the application. It serves as the foundation for specialized button types.

Parameters:

  • text (str) – Button text label.

  • parent (QWidget, optional) – Parent widget. Defaults to None.

  • callback (callable, optional) – Function to call when clicked. Defaults to None.

  • object_name (str, optional) – Qt object name for styling. Defaults to None.

Example

>>> # Creating a basic button with callback
>>> def on_click():
...     print("Button clicked!")
>>> button = TFPushButton(
...     text="Click Me",
...     parent=widget,
...     callback=on_click,
...     object_name="custom_button"
... )
__init__(text, parent=None, callback=None, object_name=None)[source]
class ui.tf_widgets.tf_buttons.TFConfirmButton(parent=None, callback=None)[source]

Bases: TFPushButton

A standardized confirmation button.

Pre-configured button with “Confirm” text and standard styling for confirmation actions.

Parameters:

  • parent (QWidget, optional) – Parent widget. Defaults to None.

  • callback (callable, optional) – Function to call when clicked. Defaults to None.

Example

>>> confirm_btn = TFConfirmButton(
...     parent=dialog,
...     callback=lambda: dialog.accept()
... )
__init__(parent=None, callback=None)[source]
class ui.tf_widgets.tf_buttons.TFResetButton(parent=None, callback=None)[source]

Bases: TFPushButton

A standardized reset button.

Pre-configured button with “Reset” text and standard styling for reset actions.

Parameters:

  • parent (QWidget, optional) – Parent widget. Defaults to None.

  • callback (callable, optional) – Function to call when clicked. Defaults to None.

Example

>>> reset_btn = TFResetButton(
...     parent=form,
...     callback=lambda: form.reset_fields()
... )
__init__(parent=None, callback=None)[source]
